section_1.title: Making Learning Fun with Quizzes
section_1.description: With our platform learning is awesome and fun with community made quizzes of different fields.

section_2.title: Our Features
section_2.description: Different features for knoweldge seekers, nonetheless always makeing it fun for you.

feature_one.title: Build Quizzes
feature_one.description: Build quizess of different kinds with our platoform with all the tools you need.

feature_two.title: Share Quizzes
feature_two.description: Quizess that can be played by others are the fun of our platform, share them now.

feature_three.title: Browse Community
feature_three.description: Our community of quizess with different categories for you to search and learn.

section_3.title: What is the Mission of our platform?
section_3.description: We are very passionate about helping the community learn, so for this reason we've build Swift Quiz to help people get knoweldge easy in a fun way for their topic they watch and love, this platform is all build by community.
